name: To Build A Fire (ugly_robot)
description:
This campfire will be your grave, you know this. And yet you cannot help but try.

A bit of 'Surgeon Simulator', a dash of 'Little Inferno', a smidge of 'The Long Dark'.

Inspired by the 1902 short story by Jack London.

Can you build a fire, while the frigid wind howls, and your fingers blacken?

Like all my games, its rough, ugly, and weird - but I'm proud of what I experimented with this one.

Let me know what you think, thanks!

Made for the 48hr game jam Ludum Dare #50.
